description: Pigment analysis is performed for each of the 9 monthly and 8 seasonal LifeWatch stations. Water is sampled with Niskin bottles at 3 meters depth and filtered directly. The Ghent University Protistology & Aquatic Ecology research group (PAE) then applies High Pressure Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) to determine pigment composition.
keywords: RV Simon Stevin, sampling, station, plankton, pigment, Oceanographic geographical features
name: Chlorophyll a (Belgian part of North Sea, 2014-2017)
